captions.text: Trouble trouble, our destiny
Who hurts more? Who loves more?
Watching you gone crazy over me
I laugh, I laugh like this
Listen uh
New cellphone I bought yesterday, I wake up to see it smashed
On the floor, my monitor I'm still paying off, and you're screaming in my face
Damn, there's no way out, I push you then you push me
We snarl at each other, so dirty so nasty, I'm going crazy
You seem like you want to break up, then don't make me say it, do it yourself
I guess you don't want to play the bad person, then you should just piss off
Yes okay, good bye, have a good life, I'll watch ya
But here's for our love's sake, I hope you meet someone as trashy as you
Trouble trouble, our destiny
Who hurts more? Who loves more?
Watching you gone crazy over me
I laugh, I laugh like this
Am I mad, or are you mad
I'm mad for staying with a mad person
Don't let me go, don't keep me
I really loved you, you were my star, but like a star in Seoul sky
I can't see you when it turns dark, I lose my mind I can't find you
Twinkle star where are you, have you gone under? Seems you have
You look like you're having fun clubbing, you surely are beaming
Who do you think you are, how dare you treat me like I have no feelings
Why do you act like that's natural, huh? Do you even realize I'm human too?
I hurt when you stab, I laugh when you tickle, I know how to get mad, I cry when I'm sad
I'm in too deep, too dirty and too deep, there's no way out
Trouble trouble, our destiny
Who hurts more? Who loves more?
Watching you gone crazy over me
I laugh, I laugh like this
The more you get miserable, the more you need me
I try to read and read and read you, but I don't get you, I can't do this anymore
You're the happiest with me, so pick to suffer than to be lonely
I've been through too much, I have no more to do with you, we're done
You're going to regret those last words
Yeah whatever, we're over, you're the worst from head to toe
Star? Yeah right, turn the lights off
I'm going to sleep, farewell then
Hurt me, love me, our destiny
Curse me all you want, but don't leave
Hurt me, love me but don't you say goodbye
No matter how shaky
Tip of my tongue like the tip of a knife
Tip of your fingers, tears fall
Am I mad, or are you mad
I guess I'm mad for staying with a mad person

title: [MV] Mad Clown(매드클라운) _ Fire(화) (Feat. Jinsil(진실) Of Mad Soul Child)
